00022 #region Usings
00023 using System;
00024 using System.Text;
00025 using System.Xml;
00026 #endregion
00027 
00028 namespace Utilities.FileFormats.APMLHelper
00029 {
00033     public class Data
00034     {
00035         #region Constructors
00036 
00037 
00038 
00039         public Data()
00040         {
00041         }
00042 
00047         public Data(XmlElement Element)
00048         {
00049             if (Element.Name.Equals("implicitdata", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase) || Element.Name.Equals("explicitdata", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00050             {
00051                 foreach (XmlNode Child in Element.ChildNodes)
00052                 {
00053                     try
00054                     {
00055                         if (Child.Name.Equals("concepts", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00056                         {
00057                             Concepts = new Concepts((XmlElement)Child);
00058                         }
00059                         else if (Child.Name.Equals("sources", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00060                         {
00061                             Sources = new Sources((XmlElement)Child);
00062                         }
00063                     }
00064                     catch { }
00065                 }
00066             }
00067         }
00068         #endregion
00069 
00070         #region Properties
00071 
00072 
00073 
00074         public Concepts Concepts
00075         {
00076             get { return _Concepts; }
00077             set { _Concepts = value; }
00078         }
00079         private Concepts _Concepts = new Concepts();
00080 
00084         public Sources Sources
00085         {
00086             get { return _Sources; }
00087             set { _Sources = value; }
00088         }
00089         private Sources _Sources = new Sources();
00090         #endregion
00091 
00092         #region Overridden Functions
00093         public override string ToString()
00094         {
00095             StringBuilder Builder = new StringBuilder();
00096             Builder.Append(Concepts.ToString());
00097             Builder.Append(Sources.ToString());
00098             return Builder.ToString();
00099         }
00100         #endregion
00101     }
00102 }
